attributes.action: change the threshholds for Educational Maintenance Allownace so that they do not depend on household income
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many of us who stay in higher education feel we are being penalised for what our parents earn, however many of us get no help with money from our parents. It should therefore not depend on household income and everyone should recieve equal amount. For instance £10 a week each.
